string.description: name of the Allocation

A short description of the Allocation resource

bool.description: If true the Allocation is enabled.

string.description: Netbox instance reference

int64.description: Prefix length when the type is subnet

list.description:
List of tags that must be included in the IPPrefix/ASNRange received from NetBox
for this allocation to be applied.

string.description: The allocation type: one of ip-address, subnet, ip-in-subnet, vlan or asn

single_nested.description: AllocationSpec defines the desired state of Allocation
AllocationStatus defines the observed state of Allocation

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
the namespace scope in which to operate

resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate

Reference to a Kubernetes secret containing netbox
credentials.
The secret must define the key `apiToken`.
Interval between NetBox instance status checks.

Reference to a Kubernetes secret containing NetBox
webhook signature secret.
Secret must define the key `signatureKey`.

bool.description: Indicates if the sync to netbox is enabled

string.description: name of the region to be associated to the site.
name of the tenant to be associated to the site.

single_nested.description:
Define Sync parameters for syncing Devices and Cables to
the NetBox instance.

string.description: Timeout for API requests to the NetBox instance.

bool.description:
If true, the app will not verify the certificate returned
by NetBox.

string.description:
configMap reference containing CA (key `trust-bundle.pem`)
to validate the certificate returned by NetBox.

single_nested.description:
Define TLS parameters for connecting to
the NetBox instance.

string.description: The URL of the Netbox instance.

single_nested.description: InstanceSpec defines the desired state of Instance

string.description: Provides an error reason if the instance is unreachable
Last checked time for connectivity status

bool.description: Indicates if the netbox instance is reachable

single_nested.description: InstanceStatus defines the observed state of Instance
